summary.para: The CMSGHDR structure defines the header for a control data object that is associated with a datagram.

remarks.para: The control information data that is associated with a datagram is made up of one or more control data objects. Each object begins with a CMSGHDR structure.

summary.para: The number of bytes from the beginning of the CMSGHDR structure to the end of the control data.
Note The value of the cmsg_len member does not account for any padding that may follow the control data.
The protocol that originated the control information.
The protocol-specific type of control information.
